Any digital or hardcopy product derived from this data should not be larger than a scale of 1:24,000 and the following disclaimer should be added to the product: "The Longwall_Panels layer was provided by the Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection. The layer was prepared using information considered to be the best historic data available. The Department assumes no responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of this information."

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

srcinfo.srccontr: This dataset was created from digitizing mine maps developed from multiple mine operators. Credit should be given to the mine operators for developing the original mine maps.

procstep.procdesc: This dataset was created by scanning mine maps submitted to the Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection (DEP) as part of the Application for Bituminous Underground Mine or part of a six month mine map update required under the permit. Various scanners were used at different locations at different times. Once a map was scanned, most of the electronic images were post-processed using Adobe Photoshop CSx, to reduce the overall file size to a manageable size to allow our computers to display them efficiently. Some of the processes performed on the images include grayscaling, image size reduction, cropping, and autocontrasting. Once the images were a managaeble size, they were georeferenced using ArcGIS to base maps, including but not limited to 7.5 minute USGS topographic maps and PAMAP aerial photography. Next, the longwall panel footprints on the map image were digitized and attributed.

attracc.attraccr: Several attributes contain details of mine names, operators, status, and other details of mining operations. These mine names, operators, status, and other details of mining operations change over time and there is NO guarantee that the data listed is the most accurate, recent, and/or complete.

horizpa.horizpar: This dataset was created by digitizing georeferenced mine maps of various/unknown accuracy and various/unknown coordinate systems to various base maps, including but not limited to USGS topographic maps and PAMAP aerial photography. Therefore horizontal accuracy of the polygons representing the longwall panel footprints are UNKNOWN.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.4.4000

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Identification field not currently being used.
The designation of the longwall panel.
The name of the coal mine.
The operator of the coal mine.
The status of the longwall panel.

edom.edomvd: Mining of the panel has been completed.
The panel location has been submitted to the DEP, but mining has not yet occurred on the panel.
The panel is actively being mined as of the last update to this dataset.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
